name: KIT208 Assignment 2 - VR [Room 24]
description:
Room 24: an Unconventional Cognitive Fitness Test

How did you end up in this room? What is the meaning behind it all?  Who cares? Test your cognitive fitness in this bizarre Virtual Reality experience!

VR application made for KIT208 assignment 2.  

- For this prototype you need to press the buttons with your right index finger (hold down right middle finger button on the oculus controller). Also there is no end screen so the application quits at the conclusion.

-kit208_assignment2_build_438697.apk should work, but if not hopefully test.apk works. Both builds should be identical :D

- See devlog for the assignment report.
